rules.natural: Provided that the company publishes results, then either the plant enhances resistance or it is not the case that the plant enhances yield.
If the researcher attends a conference, then whenever it is not the case that either the company develops technology or the company achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding.
The researcher attends a conference or the researcher presents a paper.
Whenever the researcher presents a paper, the researcher wins an award.
If the researcher is invited to an event, then whenever the researcher receives recognition, the researcher gets a promotion.
Under the condition that the company employs the researcher, then either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough.
If the researcher has skill in genetics, then the researcher has skill in biotech.
Whenever the company conducts a field trial, the company achieves a breakthrough.
Provided that the company modifies a plant, the plant enhances yield.
Either the company modifies a plant or, if the company does not conduct a field trial, then the company does not obtain approval.
If it is not the case that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, then the company receives funding.

Provided that it is not true that if the researcher wins an award then, under the condition that it is not the case that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding, then the researcher receives recognition.
Whenever the company does not employ the researcher, the researcher has skill in genetics.
Provided that the company does not conduct a field trial, the company obtains approval.

facts.natural: The researcher is invited to an event.
It is not the case that the company develops technology.
The researcher does not get a promotion.
The researcher does not have skill in biotech.
The plant does not enhance resistance.

Either the plant enhances resistance or the plant does not enhance yield.
It is not the case that the plant enhances yield.
The company does not modify a plant.
Under the condition that the company does not conduct a field trial, the company does not obtain approval.
The company conducts a field trial.
Provided that the researcher receives recognition, the researcher gets a promotion.

Whenever it is not the case that if the researcher wins an award then, provided that it is not true that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding, then the researcher gets a promotion.
If the researcher wins an award, then provided that it is not the case that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding.
Under the condition that the researcher presents a paper, if it is not true that the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, then the company does not receive funding.
Under the condition that it is not true that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, then the company does not receive funding.
Either the company develops technology or the company achieves a breakthrough.

natural_facts.A5: The company conducts a field trial.
natural_facts.A17: The researcher is invited to an event.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the company develops technology or the company achieves a breakthrough.

(A10 → (A9 ∨ ¬A8)).natural: Provided that the company publishes results, then either the plant enhances resistance or it is not the case that the plant enhances yield.

(A12 → (¬(A1 ∨ G) → ¬A11)).natural: If the researcher attends a conference, then whenever it is not the case that either the company develops technology or the company achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: The researcher attends a conference or the researcher presents a paper.

(A13 → (¬(A1 ∨ G) → ¬A11)).natural: Under the condition that the researcher presents a paper, if it is not true that the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, then the company does not receive funding.

(A13 → A14).natural: Whenever the researcher presents a paper, the researcher wins an award.

(A14 → (¬(A1 ∨ G) → ¬A11)).natural: If the researcher wins an award, then provided that it is not the case that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding.

(A16 → A15).natural: Provided that the researcher receives recognition, the researcher gets a promotion.

(A17 → (A16 → A15)).natural: If the researcher is invited to an event, then whenever the researcher receives recognition, the researcher gets a promotion.

(A2 → (A1 ∨ G)).natural: Under the condition that the company employs the researcher, then either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough.

(A4 → A3).natural: If the researcher has skill in genetics, then the researcher has skill in biotech.

(A5 → G).natural: Whenever the company conducts a field trial, the company achieves a breakthrough.

(A7 → A8).natural: Provided that the company modifies a plant, the plant enhances yield.

(A7 ∨ (¬A5 → ¬A6)).natural: Either the company modifies a plant or, if the company does not conduct a field trial, then the company does not obtain approval.

(A9 ∨ ¬A8).natural: Either the plant enhances resistance or the plant does not enhance yield.

(¬(A1 ∨ G) → A11).natural: If it is not the case that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, then the company receives funding.

(¬(A1 ∨ G) → ¬A11).natural: Under the condition that it is not true that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, then the company does not receive funding.

(¬(A14 → (¬(A1 ∨ G) → ¬A11)) → A15).natural: Whenever it is not the case that if the researcher wins an award then, provided that it is not true that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding, then the researcher gets a promotion.

(¬(A14 → (¬(A1 ∨ G) → ¬A11)) → A16).natural: Provided that it is not true that if the researcher wins an award then, under the condition that it is not the case that either the company develops technology or achieves a breakthrough, the company does not receive funding, then the researcher receives recognition.

(¬A2 → A3).natural: If the company does not employ the researcher, then the researcher has skill in biotech.

(¬A2 → A4).natural: Whenever the company does not employ the researcher, the researcher has skill in genetics.

(¬A5 → A6).natural: Provided that the company does not conduct a field trial, the company obtains approval.

(¬A5 → ¬A6).natural: Under the condition that the company does not conduct a field trial, the company does not obtain approval.

A17.natural: The researcher is invited to an event.

A5.natural: The company conducts a field trial.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the company develops technology.

¬A15.natural: The researcher does not get a promotion.

¬A3.natural: The researcher does not have skill in biotech.

¬A7.natural: The company does not modify a plant.

¬A8.natural: It is not the case that the plant enhances yield.

¬A9.natural: The plant does not enhance resistance.
